segments.text: I see a woman in a knee-length dress and apron, completely focused on drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflow from the sink catches my eye, water spilling over and forming a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so absorbed in her task, unaware of the chaos occurring right beneath her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how she can miss such a glaring issue as the water pooling around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains neutral, as if nothing is out of the ordinary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden looks pristine, a stark contrast to the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet here we have children risking a fall on that unstable stool, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
